basics.name: Mainak Mondal
basics.title: PhD Researcher — Autonomous Robotics & Networked Systems
basics.summary: Autonomy researcher building and shipping full-stack robotic systems. Focused on reinforcement learning schedulers, CARLA/ROS orchestration, and resilient V2X connectivity for ground and aerial robots.

experience.organization: University of Connecticut — Cyber-Physical Systems Laboratory
highlights: Designed and deployed MIND-CAVs, a browser-based CARLA orchestration system with LLM-assisted intent generation, FastAPI backend, React dashboard, and WebRTC streaming for closed-loop autonomy experiments.
Built autonomous driving features on F1Tenth and QCar robots using ROS on Nvidia Jetson TX2, delivering lane keeping, obstacle avoidance, SLAM, and autonomous waypoint following.
Integrated open-source 5G stacks (OpenAirInterface, SRSRAN) on robotic platforms to enable low-latency V2V/V2I communication.
Developed a reinforcement-learning charge-scheduling agent for mobile chargers in wireless powered communication networks, increasing sensor survival by ~20% while reducing travel distance by 5%.
Implemented autonomy on TurtleBot3 with ROS, including obstacle avoidance, SLAM, and waypoint following with a streamlined deployment pipeline.

experience.organization: NR Tomsk State University — High Performance Reconfigurable Systems Lab
highlights: Built zero-trust long-range UAV control using ROS, MAVLink, Lightbridge, and ZeroTier for intercontinental operations.
Engineered infrared-guided multirotor UAV landing for GPS-denied environments, improving landing precision by ~40% on mobile pads.
Designed great-circle return-to-home control using PX4Flow for fail-safe navigation in GNSS-denied settings.
Developed medical/emergency delivery drones with automated payload handling during COVID-19.
Created an autonomous scout/attack UAV with radar-based threat detection and AlexNet-based interception, plus a ruggedized scout tank for hazardous environments.
Delivered APIs for the MEAN stack platform and optimized a hybrid Ionic app, cutting load times by 300%.
Partnered with clients to gather requirements, design mockups, and deliver tailored features end-to-end.
Redesigned a plant complaint management system for the web, improving accessibility and enterprise integration.
Built the system with a C# backend and ASP.NET frontend following SOLID principles and integrated with inventory and general management tools.

projects.title: MINDCAV AutoLLM Dashboard
projects.impact: CARLA AI-in-the-loop dashboard with LLM intent, realtime telemetry, and dataset capture.
details: FastAPI backend orchestrates CARLA scenarios and WebSocket control flows.
React/Tailwind dashboard with telemetry overlays, control panels, and intent tooling.
Dual video paths (MJPEG and WebRTC) for low-latency monitoring.
Frame capture pipeline exports telemetry and image datasets for experiments.

projects.title: 5G RAN Dashboard (srsRAN + OAI)
projects.impact: Zero-install 5G telemetry dashboard with a unified schema for srsRAN and OpenAirInterface.
details: Unified JSON schema ingests snapshots from srsRAN and OAI pipelines.
Realtime UE views and rolling charts for downlink/uplink metrics.
Simple inference layer flags drops, low CQI, and bitrate trends.
Serverless ingest API and persistent history for quick triage.

projects.title: Gym Reps Tracker
projects.impact: Vite + React tracker for workout plans, set counts, and weekly progress.
details: Configurable workout plan with day-by-day exercise lists and targets.
Local progress tracking for completed sets and weekly checklists.
Chart.js visualizations for quick progress review.
PWA-ready build setup for offline-friendly tracking.

projects.title: DJI IR + AprilTag Tracking
projects.impact: Monocular AprilTag tracking for DJI A3/N3 with assisted landing and follow modes.
details: ROS workspace scripts for camera streaming and AprilTag detection.
Assisted landing workflow driven by AprilTag pose estimation.
Follow-me mode to track and maintain relative position to tags.

projects.title: Tello Coordinate System Helper
projects.impact: ENU/NED coordinate helpers for DJI Tello flight commands.
details: Coordinate transform helper wraps easytello commands.
Delta-based move API for consistent coordinate control.
Lightweight utility for rapid Tello prototyping.
